selection_reasoning: The focus is on trial_3_1, which is near-optimal. We carry forward a mix of the top performer, the previous best baseline, and two diverse geometric/physical approaches (force-directed and hexagonal) to ensure we don't get trapped in a single local maximum.

trial_selections.reasoning: Highest score so far (2.635977), using an Iterated Local Search approach. It is extremely close to the best known solution (2.635985).
Solid performance (2.627) using a force-directed method, providing a distinct optimization trajectory compared to purely gradient-based methods.
Previous best (2.6307) using a robust multi-start SLSQP approach. Good candidate for further refinement or hybridizing with the ILS strategy.
Hexagonal packing approach (2.619). While slightly lower in score, the geometric structure is unique and may be a better starting point for certain local optima.
